Naturium Niacinamide Cleansing Gel 3%

Brand: Naturium

Category: Facial Cleanser

Brand: Naturium

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Water, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Decyl Glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate, Myrciaria Dubia Fruit Extract, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Chloride
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
